casebody.data:
Ronald PETITFRERE, Appellant,
v.
EDGE WELL PERSONAL CARE PRIVATE BRANDS GROUP, Appellee. No. 3D18-369 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed October 3, 2018. Ronald Petitfrere, in proper person. Quintairos, Prieto, Wood & Boyer, P.A., and Thomas A. Valdez (Tampa), for appellee. Before ROTHENBERG, C.J., and FERNANDEZ and SCALES, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
